title: Surface Temperatures in the Caribbean Sea

content.description: Sea surface temperatures in the Caribbean Sea have increased over the past 30 years.
content.question: Which of the following is the most likely cause for the warming trend?

choices.label: Elevated levels of atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
The introduction of an invasive species of coral

content.answer: Elevated levels of atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
